flavorText:
"You can take the fight out of nearly any creature if you know where its soft spot is."
—Guttor, flesh-warper

foreignData.flavorText:
„Du kannst beinahe jede Kreatur kampfunwillig machen, wenn du ihre empfindliche Stelle kennst."
—Guttor, Fleischverformer
foreignData.name: Stechender Schmerz
foreignData.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält -1/-1 bis zum Ende des Zuges. Tappe diese Kreatur.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Puedes quitarle las ganas de luchar a casi cualquier criatura si sabes dónde está su punto débil."
—Gúttor, retuercecarne
foreignData.name: Dolor punzante
foreignData.text: La criatura objetivo obtiene -1/-1 hasta el final del turno. Gira esa criatura.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Vous pouvez vaincre n'importe quelle créature du moment que vous savez où est son point faible. »
—Guttor, corrupteur de chair
foreignData.name: Douleur lancinante
foreignData.text: La créature ciblée gagne -1/-1 jusqu'à la fin du tour. Engagez cette créature.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Puoi tirare fuori la combattività praticamente da qualsiasi creatura se sai dov'è il suo punto debole."
—Guttor, distorcicarne
foreignData.name: Dolore Lancinante
foreignData.text: Una creatura bersaglio prende -1/-1 fino alla fine del turno. TAPpa quella creatura.

foreignData.flavorText:
「敵の弱点がどこかを知っていれば、ほとんどの生き物を相手にでも戦えるわい。」
――肉体を歪める者、ガッター
foreignData.name: 突き刺す苦痛
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それはターン終了時まで－１/－１の修整を受ける。 そのクリーチャーをタップする。

foreignData.flavorText:
"Você pode tirar da batalha praticamente qualquer criatura se souber qual o seu ponto fraco."
— Guttor, deformador de carne
foreignData.name: Dor Penetrante
foreignData.text: A criatura alvo recebe -1/-1 até o final do turno. Vire aquela criatura.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Почти любое существо можно усмирить, если знать, где у него уязвимое место».
— Гаттор, деформатор плоти
foreignData.name: Колющая Боль
foreignData.text: Целевое существо получает -1/-1 до конца хода. Поверните то существо.

foreignData.flavorText:
「只要知道对方身上哪边是软的，你差不多就能打赢任何生物。」
～曲躯师嘎特
foreignData.name: 刺痛
foreignData.text: 目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。 横置该生物。

foreignData.flavorText:
「只要知道對方身上哪邊是軟的，你差不多就能打贏任何生物。」
～曲軀師嘎特
foreignData.name: 刺痛
foreignData.text: 目標生物得-1/-1直到回合結束。 橫置該生物。

name: Stabbing Pain
originalText: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Tap that creature.

rulings.text: If Stabbing Pain targets an untapped creature with 1 toughness, that creature gets -1/-1, then it becomes tapped, then (after Stabbing Pain resolves) it’s put into the graveyard as a state-based action. Similarly, if Stabbing Pain targets an untapped creature with 1 less than lethal damage marked on it (such as a 3/3 creature with 2 damage marked on it), that creature gets -1/-1, then it becomes tapped, then (after Stabbing Pain resolves) it’s destroyed as a state-based action. In each case, any abilities that trigger when that creature becomes tapped will trigger.
You may target any creature with Stabbing Pain. It’s okay if it’s already tapped.

text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Tap that creature.
